Introduction

APRIL KISS was a South Korean girl group consisting of 6 members: Sumin, Haezn, Julie, Coo.G, Sara, and Xiho. They debuted in 2011 with the single “Wannabe“, under Olleh Music. They haven’t been active since and are presumably disbanded.

Current state:
disbanded
